summary.en-US: Automatically closes authentication tabs left open by AWS VPN

description.en-US: An extension to detect and close the authentication tab left open by AWS VPN. Based on the Chrome extension by the same name. When the AWS VPN clients resubmits your stored credentials it leaves a very annoying tab open in your browser, if you are AFK for a while you can come back to a window full of tabs. This extension will only activate for tabs using the URL http://127.0.0.1:35001 and it will close it as soon as the confirmation message is displayed. This will not affect the sign in process.

version.approval_notes: The content script runs on all 127.0.0.1 URLs because I can't filter to a specific port, but it's a no-op for anything other than the AWS VPN port
